title: Ancient mosaic unearthed during post-quake excavations in Hatay
description: A Late Antique floor mosaic with a Greek inscription has been uncovered during foundation excavation works in the southern province of Hatay, revealing another layer of the region’s heritage in the aftermath of the devastating 2023 earthquakes.

title: Fermented maize water: An ancient skincare remedy
description: African fermented maize water is gaining popularity as a natural skin clarifier. The traditional practice, which has been passed down through generations, is known for its skin benefits.

title: Why DNA from ancient hunter-gatherers may increase your chances of living beyond 100
description: Italian centenarians – people who are 100 years of age or older – have a higher proportion of DNA inherited from ancient ­hunter-gatherers compared with the general population, according to a new study that could lead to better understanding of ageing.

title: SubscriberWrites: Deepavali on UNESCO list—A global glow for an ancient festival
description: UNESCO’s recognition of Deepavali honours a living, global tradition, celebrating light, diversity and renewal, while reminding us to preserve its spirit sustainably for future generations.
